activities: The Shoutlet software tool provides functionality for User Entity Marketers to build web applications, tools, widgets and other services  (“web apps”) that can be displayed in Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and FourSquare, and collect information from Shoutlet User Entities’ customers (“Individuals”). Individuals who visit Shoutlet User Entity sites who enter data into web apps are the primary source of non-public personal information (“NPI” or “personal information”) stored in Shoutlet’s database. Shoutlet’s Customer Privacy Policy is available as a hyperlink text on its website (www.Shoutlet.com) and describes the collection and use of personal information, its retention, and Shoutlet’s security controls to protect it from unauthorized disclosure.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
